STUDENTS ARE STUDENTS. RACIAL DIFFERENCES DO NOT EXIST.

DURING A PORTION OF THIS FISCAL YEAR, TEEN REACH WAS ASSOCIATED WITH QUINCY AREA CHRISTIAN SCHOOL. TEEN REACH IS FUNDED BY THE STATE OF ILLINOIS. DURING THIS FISCAL YEAR, THE STATE CUT THE TEEN REACH PROGRAM DUE TO BUDGET WOES. THEREFORE, TEEN REACH IS NO LONGER ASSOCIATED WITH QUINCY AREA CHRISTIAN SCHOOL.
